dataList.lowMoraleDescription: Сила в столкновении +3 против целей с <sprite name="CandyForCharon"><color=#e30000><u>Конфетами</u></color> и -1 против всех остальных

dataList.lowMoraleDescription: When Clashing against Identities with [CandyForCharon], Clash Power +3; when clashing against other Identities, Clash Power -1
dataList.panicDescription: When Clashing against Identities with [CandyForCharon], Clash Power +5; when clashing against other Identities, Clash Power -2
